text: Cecilia Metra is an electrical engineer at the Università di Bologna, Italy. She was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for her contributions to the online testing and fault-tolerant design of digital circuits and systems. == References == == External links == * University of Bologna faculty page Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Italian engineers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Cecilia Metra
